General.Name: Megastar Foods Limited
General.Description: Megastar Foods Limited engages in the bulk food processing and producing a range of wholesome wheat flour products in India. It offers atta, wheat flour, suji, rawa, chokar, organic atta, organic whole wheat flour, and organic wheat flour products. The company's products are used in biscuits/cookies, pizzas, breads and buns, and other products. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1964 and is based in Chandigarh, India.
